project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a simple quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end. Questions and answers will be stored in variables within the code.

task.name: Create a data structure for questions and answers
Implement the main game loop to ask questions
Track user scores throughout the quiz
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for the question structure and scoring system
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
